detail.name: Buckbeak's Execution
detail.text: To play this card, discard 2 of your Lessons from play. Before each of your turns, if there are any Creatures in play, choose 1 of them and discard it. Then, if there are no Creatures in play, discard this card.

detail.name: Cedric Diggory
detail.text: Once per game, you may discard your hand and then draw 6 cards.

detail.name: Cho Chang
detail.text: At the end of each of your turns, if an opponent has more Lessons in play than you, you may search your deck. You may take up to 2 Lessons from your deck, reveal them, put 1 into play and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Confronting Black
detail.text: Before each of your turns, count the number of Marauder cards you have in your discard pile and in play. Do that much damage to an opponent.

detail.name: Confusing Concoction
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Choose an opponent. During their next turn, when you would take any amount of damage, instead do that much damage to them, and whenever they would draw any number of cards, except during their draw step, instead you draw that many cards.

detail.name: Crookshanks
detail.text: When you play this card, you may choose a player. That player shuffles their hand into their deck and then draws 4 cards.
detail.flavorText: '...it was definitely a bit bowlegged and its face looked grumpy and oddly squashed, as though it had run headlong into a brick wall.'

detail.name: Dementor's Kiss
detail.text:
When you play this card, choose a Character in play (other than a starting Character) and put it under this card. Cards that share Uniqueness with the chosen card cannot be played.

If this card would leave play, you may instead discard 3 cards from your hand.

detail.name: Derrick and Bole
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard a Lesson from your hand. If you do, choose an opponent. During their next turn, they get 1 fewer Action. (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, they still get 1 Action.)
detail.flavorText:
Hes made some changes in the lineup and seems to be going for size rather than skill  
 Lee Jordan

detail.name: Dreaming of the Cup
detail.text: If you have a Beater, Chaser, Keeper, and Seeker in play, whenever you use an Action to play a Match, you win the Match.

detail.name: Hermione, Overworked Student
detail.text: You may use an Action and discard a Lesson from your hand. If you do, choose an opponent. During their next turn, they get 1 fewer Action. (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, they still get 1 Action.)

detail.name: Hermione's Time-Turner
detail.text: At the end of each of your turns, you may discard 1 of your Lessons from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a Unique card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Moony
detail.text: Once per game, you may put up to 5 cards in an opponen's discard pile on the bottom of their deck in any order. Then do that much damage to that opponent.
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Oliver's Last Play
detail.text: Once per turn, if you have at least 5 Lessons in your discard pile, you may use an Action to put up to 2 non-Advanced Lessons from your discard pile into play.

detail.name: Oliver the Captain
detail.text: Before each of your turns, if you have at least 1 Beater, 3 Chasers, 1 Keeper, and 1 Seeker in play, you win the game.
detail.flavorText:
"This is our last chance -
my lasty chance-
to "win the Quidditch cup.""
-Oliver Wood

detail.name: Padfoot
detail.text: This card costs 2 less Power to play for every Beater, Chaser, Keeper, and Seeker you have in play. Do 8 damage to an opponent. Then they choose 2 of their cards in play and discard them.

detail.name: Patronus
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Pettigrew's Treachery
detail.text: Players cannot play Dark cards.

detail.name: Pigwidgeon
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Choose a Character (other than a starting Character) that an opponent put into play during their last turn. Take control of that Character. If it has a Once per game ability that has already been used, use that ability.

detail.name: Prof. Flitwick, Charms Master
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Before each of your turns, draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card from your hand.

detail.name: Roger Davies
detail.text: Before each of your turns, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, until the end of your turn, card effects cannot prevent you from playing Spells.

detail.name: SMACK!
detail.text: Once per game, you may search your deck and discard pile. You may take up to 2 non-Healing Matches from your deck and/or discard pile, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Three Turns
detail.text: Choose an opponent. They may discard any number of their cards from play and/or from their hand. Then, count the number of cards they have in their hand and in play. Do twice that much damage to that opponent.

detail.name: Walden MacNair
detail.text: Choose a non-Healing card in your discard pile other than Three Turns. Play that card without using any Actions.

detail.name: Watching the Map
detail.text: Whenever a Creature does damage to you, you may prevent all but the first 1 damage.
detail.reward: You discard your hand. During your next turn, you may not play Adventures.

detail.name: Wormtail
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Animagus
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Astronomy Homework
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play.

detail.name: Battered Old Suitcase
detail.text: If this card is discarded from your hand, you may draw a card. Choose an opponent's card in play with printed Power cost less than or equal to 3 and discard it.

detail.name: Beater's Retribution
detail.text: If there are fewer than 3 cards under this card, whenever you discard cards from your hand, put 1 of them under this card face down.During your turn you may discard this card from play. If you do, put all cards under this card into your hand.

detail.name: Centaur
detail.text: Do 7 damage to an opponent. If you have fewer than 10 cards in your deck, instead do 15 damage to an opponent and discard your hand.

detail.name: Cheering Charm
detail.text: If this card is discarded from your hand, you may draw a card.

detail.name: Confiscated Map
detail.text: Put a non-Healing Spell from your discard pile into your hand.

detail.name: Deadly Prank
detail.text: When you play this card, discard 4 cards from your hand. You may discard 1 less card for every Power you have above 3. Your opponents cannot play Adventures or Events.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 3 of their cards in play and discards them.
detail.reward: Your opponent may search their deck for a Lesson, reveal it, and put it into play. Then they shuffle their deck.

detail.name: Death Warrant
detail.text: When you play this card, name a non-Lesson card. Whenever an opponent uses an Action to play the named card, they take 10 damage.

detail.name: Dementor Swarm
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 4 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Dementors on the Lake
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Whenever an opponent plays a Character, they cannot use Actions or activate abilities until the end of their turn.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent lets you choose 3 of their cards in play. Return them to their owner's hand.
detail.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

detail.name: Empty Frame
detail.note: When you play this card, if you have at least 4 Lessons in play, you get 1 more Action this turn.

detail.name: Exploding Charm
detail.text: When you play this card, name a Character card. Cards that share Uniqueness with the named card cannot be played. You may use 2 Actions and discard this card from play to search your deck. You may take the named card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Fire Omens
detail.text:
Do 3 damage to an opponent. Then draw a card.
If this card is discarded from your hand, you may draw a card.

detail.name: Flitwick's Inspection
detail.text: Count the amount of Power you have. Do that much damage to an opponent.

detail.name: Full Moon
detail.text: Choose an Item in play. Draw cards equal to the chosen Item's printed Power cost. Then each other player draws cards equal to the chosen Item's printed Power cost.

detail.name: Hermione's Secret
detail.text: If you have at least 5 Lessons in play, whenever 1 of your Creatures does damage, it does 1 more damage.

detail.name: Immaculate Concoction
detail.text: You may reveal any number of cards from your hand. For each card type revealed, do 2 damage to an opponent.

detail.name: Imminent Collision
detail.text: If this card is discarded from your hand, you may draw a card. Put up to 6 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order).

detail.name: Incorrect Interpretations
detail.text: Your opponent chooses 3 of their cards from their hand and/or in play and discards them. Then they may discard a Lesson from their hand. If they do, you choose 3 cards from your hand and/or in play and discard them. (If there are fewer than 3 cards, discard them all instead.)

detail.name: Marauder Shenanigans
detail.text: Whenever cards are put in an opponent's deck (even if they were already in the deck), do 2 damage to them.
detail.toSolve: Your opponent lets you search your deck. You may take up to 2 Events from your deck, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
detail.reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 Lessons from their discard pile into their hand.

detail.name: Moonlit Transformation
detail.text: Before each of your turns, if there is an Event in play, your opponent takes 5 damage.

detail.name: Pumpkin Patch
detail.text: Choose 1 of your Wizards or Witches in play and discard it, then put a Creature from your hand into play. (You must still pay any additional costs to play the Creature.) That Creature does damage to an opponent.

detail.name: Star Charts
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Locations in play.

detail.name: The Marauders' Legacy
detail.text: If this card is discarded from your hand, you may draw a card. Do 2 damage to an opponent. Then, if that opponent has any cards in play, they choose 1 of them and return it to its owner's hand.

detail.name: Time-Travel Hijinks
detail.text: Your Marauder cards need 3 less Power and 1 less Action to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches. If this means you would use fewer than 1 Action, you still use 1 Action.)
detail.toSolve: Your opponent discards 3 cards from their hand that share a Lesson type with a card under this card.
detail.reward: Your opponent may draw 3 cards or do 3 damage to you.

detail.name: Trelawney's Prediction
detail.note: Play this card only if you have at least 4 Lessons in play.

detail.name: Victory Party
detail.text: Choose a card type that an opponent has in play. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a card of the chosen card type, then discard all revealed cards. That opponent reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reveal a card of the chosen card type, then they discard all revealed cards.

detail.name: Biased Referee
detail.text: You may play this card without using an Action if you have won a Match this turn. You get 2 more Actions this turn. You may only play 1 Victory Party each turn.

detail.name: Blood Pops
detail.text: Whenever your opponent makes progress towards winnning a Match, increase your progress by half that amount, rounded up. (If both players would win the Match, your opponent is the winner.)

detail.name: Cancelled Match
detail.text: Discard the top card of your deck. If it shares a card type with a card an opponent has in play, you may choose one of those cards and discard it. Then draw a card.

detail.name: Caught by Dementors
detail.text: Choose up to 2 Beaters, Chasers, Keepers, and/or Seekers in play and return them to their owners' hands.

detail.name: Chilling Fog
detail.text: Choose a non-Lesson card type. During your opponent's next turn, they cannot play cards of the chosen type.

detail.name: Cho's Comet
detail.text: Do 1 damage to each Creature (even your own).

detail.name: Crookshanks' Aid
detail.text: If this card is discarded from play, put it into your hand.

detail.name: Crystal Ball
detail.text: You may use an Action to draw 3 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck in any order.

detail.name: Determined Training
detail.text: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Draw that many cards plus 1.

detail.name: Disarming Snape
detail.text: Do 6 damage to an opponent or choose a Character in play and discard it.

detail.name: Dizzying Workload
detail.text: Count the number of Lessons in your discard pile. Until the end of your turn, your cards need that much less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)

detail.name: Double-Ended Newt
detail.text: Whenever this card does damage to an opponent, you may choose a Creature in play. Do 1 damage to it.

detail.name: Dropping Divination
detail.text: Choose an opponent's card in play and return it to its owner's hand. If you have at least 3 Lessons in your discard pile, instead shuffle it into its owner's deck.

detail.name: Empty Classroom
detail.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play.

detail.name: Executioner's Axe
detail.text: Whenever a Creature is discarded from play, you may do 2 damage to an opponent or draw a card.

detail.name: Ferula
detail.text: Shuffle up to 3 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck. If you have at least 3 Lessons in your discard pile, instead shuffle up to 8 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

detail.name: Glacius
detail.text: Do 4 damage to an opponent. If you have at least 3 Lessons in your discard pile, instead do 6 damage to an opponent and draw a card.

detail.name: Hinkypunk
detail.text: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Whenever an opponent uses an Action to play a Lesson, do 2 damage to them.

detail.name: Hippogriff
detail.text: When you play this card, you may put up to 3 damage counters on it. If you do, do that much damage divided as you choose among any number of creatures.

detail.name: Hurling Hex
detail.text: Do 4 damage to your opponent. You may also choose a Creature in play and do 4 damage to it.

detail.name: Inter-House Final
detail.toSolve: The winner may draw 2 cards. The loser takes 8 damage.
detail.note: Whenever a player takes damage, they may discard any number of cards from their hand. They prevent that much damage.

detail.name: Lupin's Resignation
detail.text: If at least 1 of your Creatures dealt damage to an opponent this turn, choose a non-Healing Character in play and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

detail.name: Marking the Seeker
detail.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck, then put them on the top and/or bottom of your deck in any order. If you have at least 3 Lessons in your discard pile, draw 2 cards.
detail.flavorText: '... he glanced around, saw Malfoy on his tail ...'

detail.name: Nox
detail.text: Choose two of the following, then shuffle this card into your deck: Look at the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck, then put them back in any order. Prevent the next 1 damage you would take on an opponent's next turn. An opponent discards a card from their hand.

detail.name: Patronus Practice
detail.text: Choose an opponent's card in play. They may discard the card from play. If they don't, draw 2 cards and you get 1 more Action this turn.

detail.name: Pocket Sneakoscope
detail.text: All opponents reveal any cards they draw during their draw step.

detail.name: Pressing the Knot
detail.text: Do 4 damage to an opponent. During that opponent's next turn, they can't use Actions to play Creatures.

detail.name: Red Sparks
detail.text: Choose an opponent's Creature in play and do 3 damage to it. If you have any cards in hand, choose and discard 1 of them.

detail.name: Scabbers' Disappearance
detail.text: Once during each of your turns, whenever 1 of your Creatures does damage to an opponent, you may return it to its owner's hand.

detail.name: Scabbers' Return
detail.text: You may put a Creature from your discard pile into your hand. If you have at least 3 Lessons in your discard pile, you may play that Creature without using an Action.

detail.name: Sirius' Letter
detail.text: Whenever you search your deck, you may draw a card.

detail.name: Wizard's Desk
detail.text: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of cards you discarded from your hand this turn or any opponents' last turn.

detail.name: Ancient Runes, Third Year
detail.text: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a or Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Arithmancy, Third Year
detail.text: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a or Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Herbology, Third Year
detail.text: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a or Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: History of Magic, Third Year
detail.text: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a or Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

detail.name: Muggle Studies, Third Year
detail.text: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a or Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.
